content.html: Honeycomb on call teams have an SLO of not getting paged more than twice a week, or having to work an incident outside of business hours more than once every six months. We were burning out our people, so we had to call a halt to the flurry of changes.
content.value:
Honeycomb on call teams have an SLO of not getting paged more than twice a week, or having to work an incident outside of business hours more than once every six months.

We were burning out our people, so we had to call a halt to the flurry of changes.
